named-native-query.name: OdontologicalReports.OdontologicalProceduresConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query:
SELECT concat(ins.name, '(SISA: ', ins.sisa_code, ' | CUIT: ', ins.cuit, ')') AS institution, concat(p.first_name, ' ', p.middle_names, ' ', p.last_name, ' ', p.other_last_names) as professionalName, p.identification_number as professionalIdentificationNumber, hp.license_number AS professionalLicenseNumber, oc.performed_date as attentionDate,
to_char(oc.created_on AT TIME ZONE 'UTC+0', 'HH24:MI') as attentionHour, concat(pp.first_name , ' ', pp.last_name) as patientNames, pp.identification_number as patientIdentificationNumber, g.description as patientGender, gg.description as patientSelfPerceivedGender, pe.name_self_determination as patientSelfPerceivedName, pp.birth_date patientBirthDate, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as patientAgeTurn, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as patientAgeToday, concat(mc.name, '(RNOS: ', hi.rnos, ')') as patientMedicalCoverage, concat(a.street, ' N° ', a.number, case when a.floor is not null then concat(' Piso: ', a.floor, 'Departamento: ', a.apartment) end) as patientAddress, c.description as patientLocation, concat(oci.permanent_c, '|', oci.permanent_p, '|', oci.permanent_o) as patientPermanentCPO, concat(oci.temporary_c, '|', oci.temporary_e, '|', oci.temporary_o) as patientTemporaryCEO, (SELECT string_agg(r.description, ', ') from odontology_consultation_reason ocr INNER JOIN odontology_reason r on ocr.reason_id=r.id where ocr.odontology_consultation_id=oc.id) as reasons, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_prob.pt,' (',ccs.description,' & ',cvs.description,' - Fecha: ',hc.start_date ,')', '[SNOMED: ', s_prob.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', hc.cie10_codes, ']'), ', ') from document_health_condition dhc INNER JOIN health_condition hc on dhc.health_condition_id=hc.id INNER JOIN problem_type pt on hc.problem_id=pt.id INNER JOIN snomed s_prob on hc.snomed_id=s_prob.id INNER JOIN condition_clinical_status ccs on hc.status_id=ccs.id INNER JOIN condition_verification_status cvs on hc.verification_status_id=cvs.id where dhc.document_id=d.id) as otherDiagnoses, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_proc.pt, '(', ps.description, ' | SNOMED: ', s_proc.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', proc.cie10_codes, ')'), ', ') from document_procedure dp INNER JOIN procedures proc on dp.procedure_id=proc.id INNER JOIN procedures_status ps on proc.status_id=ps.id INNER JOIN snomed s_proc on proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id where dp.document_id=d.id) as otherProcedures, (SELECT string_agg(concat(sai.pt, '(', aics.description, ' | SNOMED: ' , sai.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', ai.cie10_codes, ' | Categoria: ', aic.display, ' | Criticidad: ', aicr.display, ' | Tipo: ', ait.display, ' | Verificación: ', aivs.description, ')'), ', ') from document_allergy_intolerance dai INNER JOIN allergy_intolerance ai ON dai.allergy_intolerance_id=ai.id INNER JOIN snomed sai ON ai.snomed_id=sai.id INNER JOIN allergy_intolerance_clinical_status aics ON ai.status_id=aics.id INNER JOIN allergy_intolerance_category aic ON ai.category_id = aic.id INNER JOIN allergy_intolerance_criticality aicr ON ai.criticality=aicr.id INNER JOIN allergy_intolerance_type ait ON ai.type=ait.id INNER JOIN allergy_intolerance_verification_status aivs ON ai.verification_status_id=aivs.id where dai.document_id=d.id) as allergies, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_med.pt, '[SNOMED: ', s_med.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', ms.cie10_codes, '] (status: ', mss.description, ')'), ', ') FROM document_medicamention_statement dms INNER JOIN medication_statement ms on dms.medication_statement_id=ms.id INNER JOIN medication_statement_status mss on ms.status_id=mss.id INNER JOIN snomed s_med on ms.snomed_id=s_med.id WHERE dms.document_id=d.id) as usualMedication, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_d.pt, '(SNOMED: ', s_d.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', od.cie10_codes, ')[diente: ', std.pt, ' | sctid: ', std.sctid, '][superficie: ', sfd.pt, ' | sctid', sfd.sctid, ']'), ', ') from document_odontology_diagnostic dod INNER JOIN odontology_diagnostic od ON dod.odontology_diagnostic_id=od.id INNER JOIN snomed s_d on od.snomed_id=s_d.id LEFT JOIN snomed std ON od.tooth_id=std.id LEFT JOIN snomed sfd ON od.surface_id=sfd.id WHERE dod.document_id=d.id) AS dentalDiagnoses, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_p.pt, '(SNOMED: ', s_p.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', op.cie10_codes, ')[diente: ', stp.pt, ' | sctid: ', stp.sctid, '][superficie: ', sfp.pt, ' | sctid', sfp.sctid, ']'), ', ') from document_odontology_procedure dop INNER JOIN odontology_procedure op on dop.odontology_procedure_id=op.id INNER JOIN snomed s_p on op.snomed_id=s_p.id LEFT JOIN snomed stp ON op.tooth_id=stp.id LEFT JOIN snomed sfp ON op.surface_id=sfp.id WHERE dop.document_id=d.id) as dentalProcedures, (SELECT string_agg(ev.description, ', ') from note ev where d.other_note_id=ev.id) as evolution FROM odontology_consultation oc LEFT JOIN odontology_consultation_indices oci ON oci.odontology_consultation_id=oc.id LEFT JOIN institution ins on oc.institution_id=ins.id LEFT JOIN healthcare_professional hp ON oc.doctor_id=hp.id INNER JOIN person p on hp.person_id=p.id LEFT JOIN patient pa on oc.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN person pp on pa.person_id=pp.id LEFT JOIN person_extended pe on pe.person_id=pp.id INNER JOIN gender g on pp.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN gender gg on pe.gender_self_determination=gg.id LEFT JOIN patient_medical_coverage pmc ON pmc.patient_id=oc.patient_medical_coverage_id LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc on pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN health_insurance hi on hi.id=mc.id LEFT JOIN address a on pe.address_id=a.id LEFT JOIN city c on a.city_id=c.id LEFT JOIN document d on d.source_id=oc.id AND d.source_type_id=6 WHERE oc.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND ins.id = :institutionId order by oc.created_on;

named-native-query.name: NursingReports.NursingEmergencyConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query:
SELECT --ece.created_on, ins.id as institution_id, concat(ins.name, ' ', ins.sisa_code) AS institution, ece.ambulance_company_id AS ambulance, d_of.description AS office, css.description AS sector, CASE WHEN ece.has_police_intervention=true THEN concat('Sí') ELSE concat('No') END AS policeIntervention, concat(EXTRACT(DAY FROM ece.updated_on), '/', EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ece.updated_on), '/', EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ece.updated_on)) AS attentionDate, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(HOUR FROM ece.updated_on)) < 3 THEN concat(24-EXTRACT(HOUR FROM ece.updated_on), ':', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ece.updated_on)) ELSE concat(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM ece.updated_on)-3, ':', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ece.updated_on)) END AS attentionHour, concat(puc.last_name, ' ', puc.other_last_names, ', ', puc.first_name, ' ', puc.middle_names) AS professionalRegistering, concat(puu.last_name, ' ', puu.other_last_names, ', ', puu.first_name, ' ', puu.middle_names) AS professionalAttention, concat(it.description, ' ', pe.identification_number) AS identification, concat(pe.last_name, ' ', pe.other_last_names) AS lastName, concat(pe.first_name, ' ', pe.middle_names) AS names, g.description AS gender, gg.description AS selfPerceivedGender, pex.name_self_determination selfPerceivedName, pe.birth_date birthDate, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ece.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)) < 0 THEN concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ece.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ece.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') ELSE concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ece.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ece.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') END AS ageTurn, case WHEN (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)) < 0 THEN concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') ELSE concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') END AS ageToday, et.pt ethnicity, concat(a.street, ' N° ', a.number, CASE WHEN a.floor IS NOT NULL THEN concat(' Piso: ', a.floor, 'Departamento: ', a.apartment) END) AS addressPatient, c.description AS locationPatient, concat(mc.name, '(', hi.rnos, ')', pmc.affiliate_number) AS medicalCoverage, ec_in_t.description AS emergencyCareEntrance, ec_st.description AS statePatient, ec_t.description AS attentionType, (SELECT string_agg(tr.notes, ', ') FROM triage tr WHERE tr.emergency_care_episode_id=ece.id) AS triageNote, concat(tr_cat.name, ' Codigo: ', tr_cat.color_name) as triageLevel, ec_dis.administrative_discharge_on dateDischarge, ec_dis.ambulance_company_id AS ambulanceDischarge, dis.description AS typeDischarge, dis_out.description AS patientExit FROM emergency_care_episode ece INNER JOIN institution ins ON ece.institution_id = ins.id INNER JOIN emergency_care_state ec_st ON ece.emergency_care_state_id = ec_st.id INNER JOIN patient pa ON ece.patient_id = pa.id INNER JOIN person pe ON pa.person_id = pe.id INNER JOIN identification_type it ON pe.identification_type_id=it.id LEFT JOIN person_extended pex ON pex.person_id=pe.id LEFT JOIN gender gg ON pex.gender_self_determination=gg.id LEFT JOIN ethnicity et ON pex.ethnicity_id=et.id LEFT JOIN education_level ed ON pex.education_level_id=ed.id LEFT JOIN occupation lab ON pex.occupation_id=lab.id LEFT JOIN address a ON pex.address_id=a.id LEFT JOIN city c ON a.city_id=c.id INNER JOIN gender g ON pe.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN patient_medical_coverage pmc ON ece.patient_medical_coverage_id=pmc.id LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc ON pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN health_insurance hi ON hi.id=mc.id LEFT JOIN emergency_care_entrance_type ec_in_t ON ece.emergency_care_entrance_type_id = ec_in_t.id LEFT JOIN emergency_care_type ec_t ON ece.emergency_care_type_id = ec_t.id LEFT JOIN emergency_care_discharge ec_dis ON ece.id = ec_dis.emergency_care_episode_id LEFT JOIN discharge_type dis ON ec_dis.discharge_type_id = dis.id LEFT JOIN emergency_care_entrance_type dis_out ON ec_dis.hospital_transport_id=dis_out.id LEFT JOIN doctors_office d_of ON ece.doctors_office_id=d_of.id LEFT JOIN clinical_specialty_sector css ON d_of.sector_id=css.id LEFT JOIN triage_category tr_cat ON ece.triage_category_id=tr_cat.id
INNER JOIN users uc ON ece.created_by=uc.id INNER JOIN user_role ucr ON ucr.user_id=uc.id INNER JOIN ROLE rc ON ucr.role_id=rc.id INNER JOIN user_person uc_p ON uc_p.user_id=uc.id INNER JOIN person puc ON uc_p.person_id=puc.id INNER JOIN users uu ON ece.updated_by=uu.id INNER JOIN user_role uur ON uur.user_id=uu.id INNER JOIN ROLE ru ON uur.role_id=ru.id INNER JOIN user_person uu_p ON uu_p.user_id=uu.id INNER JOIN person puu ON uu_p.person_id=puu.id WHERE (rc.description like '%Enfermero%' OR ru.description LIKE '%Enfermero%') AND (ece.created_on >= date_trunc('hour', (NOW() + (INTERVAL '-24 hour'))) AND ece.created_on < date_trunc('hour', NOW())) AND ins.id = :institutionId

named-native-query.name: NursingReports.NursingOutpatientConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query: SELECT concat(ins.name, '(SISA: ', ins.sisa_code, ' | CUIT: ', ins.cuit, ')') AS institution, cs.name AS operativeUnit, concat(p.first_name, ' ', p.middle_names, ' ', p.last_name, ' ', p.other_last_names) AS patientProvider, p.identification_number AS providerDni, oc.performed_date AS attentionDate, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(HOUR FROM oc.created_on)) < 3 THEN concat(21+EXTRACT(HOUR FROM oc.created_on), ':', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM oc.created_on)) ELSE concat(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM oc.created_on)-3, ':', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM oc.created_on)) END AS hour, (row_number() OVER(partition BY oc.doctor_id ORDER BY oc.performed_date)) AS consultationNumber, pp.identification_number AS patientDni, concat(pp.first_name , ' ', pp.last_name) AS patientName, g.description AS gender, gg.description AS selfPerceivedGender, pe.name_self_determination selfPerceivedName, pp.birth_date birthDate, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 THEN concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') ELSE concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') END AS ageTurn, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 THEN concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') ELSE concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') END AS ageToday, et.pt ethnicity, (SELECT string_agg(concat(mc.name, '(RNOS: ', hi.rnos, ')'), ', ') FROM patient_medical_coverage pmc LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc ON pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN health_insurance hi ON hi.id=mc.id WHERE pmc.patient_id=pa.id) AS medicalCoverage, concat(a.street, ' N° ', a.number, CASE WHEN a.floor IS NOT null THEN concat(' Piso: ', a.floor, 'Departamento: ', a.apartment) END) AS patientAddress, c.description AS patientLocation, ed.description AS educationLevel, lab.description AS occupation, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=1) AS systolicPressure, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=2) AS diastolicPressure, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=3) AS meanArterialPressure, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=4) AS temperature, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=5) AS heartRate, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=6) AS respiratoryRate, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=7) AS arterialOxygenSaturation, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=8) AS height, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=9) AS weight, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=10) AS bmi, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_proc.pt, '(', ps.description, ' | SNOMED: ', s_proc.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', proc.cie10_codes, ')'), ', ') FROM document_procedure dp INNER JOIN procedures proc ON dp.procedure_id=proc.id INNER JOIN procedures_status ps ON proc.status_id=ps.id INNER JOIN snomed s_proc ON proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id WHERE dp.document_id=d.id) AS procedures, (SELECT string_agg(ev.description, ', ') FROM note ev WHERE d.other_note_id=ev.id) AS evolution FROM nursing_consultation oc LEFT JOIN institution ins ON oc.institution_id=ins.id LEFT JOIN clinical_specialty cs ON oc.clinical_specialty_id=cs.id LEFT JOIN healthcare_professional hp ON oc.doctor_id=hp.id INNER JOIN person p ON hp.person_id=p.id LEFT JOIN patient pa ON oc.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN person pp ON pa.person_id=pp.id LEFT JOIN person_extended pe ON pe.person_id=pp.id LEFT JOIN ethnicity et ON pe.ethnicity_id=et.id LEFT JOIN education_level ed ON pe.education_level_id=ed.id LEFT JOIN occupation lab ON pe.occupation_id=lab.id INNER JOIN gender g ON pp.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN gender gg ON pe.gender_self_determination=gg.id LEFT JOIN patient_medical_coverage pmc ON pmc.patient_id=pa.id LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc ON pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN address a ON pe.address_id=a.id LEFT JOIN city c ON a.city_id=c.id LEFT JOIN document d ON oc.id=d.source_id AND d.source_type_id=7 WHERE oc.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND ins.id = :institutionId

named-native-query.name: NursingReports.NursingHospitalizationConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query: WITH signos_vitales AS( SELECT d.id AS id_doc, s.id, s.pt AS name, ovs.value AS value FROM document d INNER JOIN document_vital_sign dvs ON dvs.document_id=d.id INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s ON ovs.snomed_id=s.id ), procedimientos AS( SELECT dp.document_id AS document_id, s.pt AS pt, ps.description AS description, s.sctid AS sctid, proc.cie10_codes FROM document_procedure dp INNER JOIN procedures proc on dp.procedure_id=proc.id INNER JOIN procedures_status ps on proc.status_id=ps.id INNER JOIN snomed s on proc.snomed_id=s.id WHERE ps.description<>'Ingresado por error' AND ps.description<>'Desconocido' ) SELECT ins.name AS institution, concat(pe.last_name, ' ', pe.other_last_names) AS lastName, concat(pe.first_name, ' ', pe.middle_names) AS completeName, g.description AS gender, concat(i_t.description, ' ', pe.identification_number) AS identification, concat(pe_pr.last_name, ' ', pe_pr.other_last_names, ', ', pe_pr.first_name, ' ', pe_pr.middle_names) AS professional, pr_s.license_number AS licenseNumber, ie.entry_date AS entryDate, ie.probable_discharge_date AS probableDischargeDate, bed.bed_number AS bed, b_cat.description AS categoryBed, room.description AS roomName, sector.description AS sector, pd.administrative_discharge_date AS dischargeDate, (SELECT string_agg(concat(pr.pt, ' (', pr.sctid, ')'), ' | ') FROM procedimientos pr WHERE pr.document_id=d.id) AS procedures, (SELECT string_agg(concat(sv.name, ': ', sv.value), ' | ') FROM signos_vitales sv WHERE sv.id_doc=d.id) AS vitalSign FROM internment_episode ie INNER JOIN institution ins ON ie.institution_id=ins.id LEFT JOIN patient_discharge pd ON ie.id = pd.internment_episode_id LEFT JOIN discharge_type dt ON pd.discharge_type_id = dt.id INNER JOIN patient pa ON ie.patient_id = pa.id INNER JOIN person pe ON pa.person_id = pe.id INNER JOIN identification_type i_t ON pe.identification_type_id=i_t.id INNER join gender g ON pe.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN bed ON ie.bed_id=bed.id LEFT JOIN room ON bed.room_id=room.id LEFT JOIN sector ON room.sector_id=sector.id LEFT JOIN bed_category b_cat ON bed.bed_category_id=b_cat.id LEFT JOIN document d ON ie.anamnesis_doc_id=d.id LEFT JOIN document dd ON ie.epicrisis_doc_id=dd.id INNER JOIN healthcare_professional_group hpg ON hpg.internment_episode_id=ie.id INNER JOIN healthcare_professional pr_s ON hpg.healthcare_professional_id=pr_s.id INNER JOIN person pe_pr ON pr_s.person_id=pe_pr.id INNER JOIN professional_professions pr_r ON pr_r.healthcare_professional_id=pr_s.id INNER JOIN professional_specialty spc ON pr_r.professional_specialty_id=spc.id WHERE (ie.status_id = 1 OR pd.internment_episode_id IS NULL) AND (spc.sctid_code='5275007' OR spc.sctid_code='308211001' OR spc.sctid_code='1951000221103') AND d.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND ins.id= :institutionId

named-native-query.name: NursingReports.NursingProceduresConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query: WITH source AS ( SELECT oc.id, oc.created_by, oc.created_on, oc.institution_id, oc.patient_id, 'Consulta Ambulatoria' AS origin, oc.document_id FROM outpatient_consultation oc UNION SELECT nc.id, nc.created_by, nc.created_on, nc.institution_id, nc.patient_id, 'Consulta de Enfermería' AS origin, dnc.id AS document_id FROM nursing_consultation nc LEFT JOIN document dnc ON nc.id=dnc.source_id AND dnc.source_type_id=7 UNION SELECT ie.id, ie.created_by, ie.created_on, ie.institution_id, ie.patient_id, 'Internación' AS origin, ie.anamnesis_doc_id AS document_id FROM internment_episode ie UNION SELECT ece.id, ece.created_by, ece.created_on, ece.institution_id, ece.patient_id, 'Guardia' AS origin, dece.id FROM emergency_care_episode ece LEFT JOIN document dece ON ece.id=dece.source_id AND dece.source_type_id=4 ), source_details AS ( SELECT DISTINCT s.*, up.person_id, hp.id AS healthcare_professional_id, hp.license_number FROM source s INNER JOIN user_person up ON s.created_by=up.user_id INNER JOIN healthcare_professional hp ON hp.person_id=up.person_id INNER JOIN professional_professions hpp ON hpp.healthcare_professional_id=hp.id INNER JOIN professional_specialty prs ON hpp.professional_specialty_id=prs.id INNER JOIN healthcare_professional_specialty hps ON hps.professional_profession_id=hpp.id INNER JOIN clinical_specialty cs ON cs.id=hps.clinical_specialty_id WHERE prs.sctid_code IN ('1951000221103', '308211001', '5275007') ) SELECT DISTINCT concat(ins.name, '(SISA: ', ins.sisa_code, ' | CUIT: ', ins.cuit, ')') AS institution, oc.origin AS source, concat(p.first_name, ' ', p.middle_names, ' ', p.last_name, ' ', p.other_last_names) AS lender, p.identification_number AS lenderDni, oc.created_on AS attentionDate, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(HOUR FROM oc.created_on)) < 3 THEN concat(21+EXTRACT(HOUR FROM oc.created_on), ':', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM oc.created_on)) ELSE concat(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM oc.created_on)-3, ':', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM oc.created_on)) END AS hour, pp.identification_number AS patientDni, concat(pp.first_name , ' ', pp.last_name) AS patientName, g.description AS gender, gg.description AS selfPerceivedGener, pe.name_self_determination selfPerceiverName, pp.birth_date birthday, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 THEN concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM oc.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') ELSE concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM oc.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM oc.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') END AS ageTurn, CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 THEN concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') ELSE concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') END AS ageToday, et.pt ethnicity, (SELECT string_agg(concat(mc.name, '(RNOS: ', hi.rnos, ')'), ', ') from patient_medical_coverage pmc LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc ON pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN health_insurance hi ON hi.id=mc.id WHERE pmc.patient_id=pa.id) AS medicalCoverage, concat(a.street, ' N° ', a.number, CASE WHEN a.floor is not null THEN concat(' Piso: ', a.floor, 'Departamento: ', a.apartment) END) AS address, c.description AS location, ed.description AS educationLevel, lab.description AS occupation, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=1) AS systolicBloodPressure, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=2) AS diastolicBloodPressure, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=3) AS meanArterialPressure, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=4) AS temperature, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=5) AS heartRate, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=6) AS respirationRate, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=7) AS oxygenSaturationHemoglobin, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=8) AS height, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=9) AS weight, (SELECT ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs ON dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id INNER JOIN snomed s_vs ON ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id WHERE dvs.document_id=d.id AND s_vs.id=10) AS bmi, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_proc.pt, '(', ps.description, ' | SNOMED: ', s_proc.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', proc.cie10_codes, ')'), ', ') from document_procedure dp INNER JOIN procedures proc ON dp.procedure_id=proc.id INNER JOIN procedures_status ps ON proc.status_id=ps.id INNER JOIN snomed s_proc ON proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id WHERE dp.document_id=d.id) AS procedures, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_prob.pt,' (',ccs.description,' & ',cvs.description,' - Fecha: ',hc.start_date ,')', '[SNOMED: ', s_prob.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', hc.cie10_codes, ']'), ', ') from document_health_condition dhc INNER JOIN health_condition hc ON dhc.health_condition_id=hc.id INNER JOIN problem_type pt ON hc.problem_id=pt.id INNER JOIN snomed s_prob ON hc.snomed_id=s_prob.id INNER JOIN condition_clinical_status ccs ON hc.status_id=ccs.id INNER JOIN condition_verification_status cvs ON hc.verification_status_id=cvs.id WHERE dhc.document_id=d.id) AS problems, (SELECT string_agg(concat(s_med.pt, '[SNOMED: ', s_med.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', ms.cie10_codes, '] (status: ', mss.description, ')'), ', ') FROM document_medicamention_statement dms INNER JOIN medication_statement ms ON dms.medication_statement_id=ms.id INNER JOIN medication_statement_status mss ON ms.status_id=mss.id INNER JOIN snomed s_med ON ms.snomed_id=s_med.id WHERE dms.document_id=d.id) AS medication, (SELECT string_agg(ev.description, ', ') from note ev WHERE d.other_note_id=ev.id) AS evolution from source_details oc LEFT JOIN institution ins ON oc.institution_id=ins.id INNER JOIN person p ON oc.person_id=p.id LEFT JOIN patient pa ON oc.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN person pp ON pa.person_id=pp.id LEFT JOIN person_extended pe ON pe.person_id=pp.id LEFT JOIN ethnicity et ON pe.ethnicity_id=et.id LEFT JOIN education_level ed ON pe.education_level_id=ed.id LEFT JOIN occupation lab ON pe.occupation_id=lab.id INNER JOIN gender g ON pp.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN gender gg ON pe.gender_self_determination=gg.id LEFT JOIN patient_medical_coverage pmc ON pmc.patient_id=pa.id LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc ON pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN address a ON pe.address_id=a.id LEFT JOIN city c ON a.city_id=c.id LEFT JOIN document d ON oc.document_id=d.id WHERE oc.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND (pmc.id is not null AND NOT (lower(mc.name) LIKE '%sumar%')) AND ins.id= :institutionId ORDER BY oc.created_on;

named-native-query.name: NursingReports.NursingVaccineConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query: SELECT concat(ins.name, '(SISA: ', ins.sisa_code, ' | CUIT: ', ins.cuit, ')') AS institution, cs.name as operativeUnit, concat(p.first_name, ' ', p.middle_names, ' ', p.last_name, ' ', p.other_last_names) as provider, p.identification_number as providerIdentificationNumber, vc.performed_date as attentionDate, pp.identification_number as patientIdentificationNumber, concat(pp.first_name , ' ', pp.last_name) as patientName, g.description as patientGender, pp.birth_date patientBirthDate, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM vc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM vc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vc.performed_date) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as ageOnAppointmentDate, sim.pt as vaccine, sim.sctid as sctid, im.cie10_codes as cie10Code, ims.description as status, vd.condition_description as condition, vd.scheme_description as vaccinationSchedule, vd.dose as vaccinationDosage, vd.lot_number as vaccinationLot FROM vaccine_consultation vc INNER JOIN patient pa ON vc.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN person pp ON pa.person_id=pp.id INNER JOIN gender g ON pp.gender_id=g.id INNER JOIN institution ins ON vc.institution_id=ins.id INNER JOIN healthcare_professional hcp ON vc.doctor_id=hcp.id INNER JOIN person p ON hcp.person_id=p.id INNER JOIN clinical_specialty cs ON vc.clinical_specialty_id=cs.id INNER JOIN document d ON d.source_id=vc.id AND d.source_type_id=5 INNER JOIN document_inmunization di ON di.document_id=d.id INNER JOIN inmunization im ON di.inmunization_id=im.id AND im.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN inmunization_status ims ON im.status_id=ims.id INNER JOIN snomed sim ON im.snomed_id=sim.id INNER JOIN v_nomivac_immunization_data vd ON vd.vaccine_sctid=sim.sctid AND im.patient_id=vd.patient_id AND im.administration_date=vd.administration_date and im.institution_id=vd.institution_id WHERE cs.name LIKE 'Enfermería%' AND vc.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND ins.id= :institutionId

named-native-query.name: PregnantPeopleReports.PregnantAttentionsConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query: WITH base AS (select distinct oc.*, d.source_id, d.source_type_id, d.type_id as document_type_id, d.status_id as document_status_id, d.other_note_id from outpatient_consultation oc left join outpatient_consultation_reasons ocr on ocr.outpatient_consultation_id=oc.id left join reasons r on ocr.reason_id=r.id inner join document d on oc.document_id=d.id left join document_health_condition dhc on dhc.document_id=d.id left join health_condition hc on (dhc.health_condition_id=hc.id AND hc.problem_id<>'57177007') left join snomed s_hc on hc.snomed_id=s_hc.id left join document_procedure dp on dp.document_id=d.id left join procedures proc on (dp.procedure_id=proc.id and proc.status_id<>'723510000') left join snomed s_proc on proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id where (r.id IN ('182947002','237628005','156036003','386322007','169573007','350071000221105','235888006','78558002','429070000','609563008','609564002','44963006','309737007','370383002','171054004','313107007','171055003','440536005','87527008','237240001', '135881001','312891008','313178001','18656007','274116002','288250001','82771000119102','72271000119100','428165003','44795003','307534009','171000119107','200144004','146799005','127364007','151901000119101','250423000','56026007','127365008','199154009', '702737001','74961000119106','10761671000119108','386639001','349971000221103','10750111000119108','428252001','110081000119109','422808006') OR s_proc.sctid IN ('182947002','237628005','386322007','350071000221105','235888006','609563008','609564002','44963006','309737007','370383002','171054004','313107007','171055003','440536005','87527008','237240001','47200007','134781000119106','237239003','34801009', '65147003','459166009','58532003','237233002','90968009','237627000','691000221104','135881001','169712008','169713003','169714009','169715005','169716006','169717002','169718007','169719004','169720005','169721009','169722002','169723007', '169724001','169725000','169726004','169727008','312891008','274116002','82771000119102','72271000119100','428165003','44795003','307534009','171000119107','151901000119101','250423000','199154009','702737001','10761671000119108','386639001','349971000221103','10750111000119108', '428252001','110081000119109')) AND oc.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND oc.institution_id= :institutionId ORDER BY oc.id ASC, oc.created_on ASC ) SELECT cs.name as operativeUnit, pp.identification_number as patientIdentificationNumber, concat(pp.last_name, ' ', pp.other_last_names) as patientLastName, concat(pp.first_name, ' ', pp.middle_names) as patientFirstName, pp.birth_date as patientBirthDate, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as patientAgeToday, concat(ap.street, ' N° ', ap.number, case when ap.floor is not null then concat(' Piso: ', ap.floor, 'Departamento: ', ap.apartment) end) as patientAddress, pex.phone_number as phoneNumber, c.description as patientLocation, b.created_on AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3' as attentionDate, concat(mc.name, '(RNOS: ', hi.rnos, ')') as patientMedicalCoverage, (select string_agg(r.description, ', ') from outpatient_consultation_reasons ocr inner join reasons r on ocr.reason_id=r.id where ocr.outpatient_consultation_id=b.id) as reasons, (select string_agg(concat(s_prob.pt,' (',ccs.description,' & ',cvs.description,' - Fecha: ',hc.start_date, ' - Tipo: ', pt.description,')', '[SNOMED: ', s_prob.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', hc.cie10_codes, ']'), ', ') from document_health_condition dhc inner join health_condition hc on dhc.health_condition_id=hc.id inner join problem_type pt on hc.problem_id=pt.id inner join snomed s_prob on hc.snomed_id=s_prob.id inner join condition_clinical_status ccs on hc.status_id=ccs.id inner join condition_verification_status cvs on hc.verification_status_id=cvs.id where dhc.document_id=b.document_id and hc.problem_id<>'57177007') as problems, (select string_agg(concat(s_proc.pt, '(', ps.description, ' | SNOMED: ', s_proc.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', proc.cie10_codes, ')'), ', ') from document_procedure dp inner join procedures proc on dp.procedure_id=proc.id inner join procedures_status ps on proc.status_id=ps.id inner join snomed s_proc on proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id where dp.document_id=b.document_id) as procedures, (select string_agg(ev.description, ', ') from note ev where b.other_note_id=ev.id) as evolution FROM base b left join institution ins on b.institution_id=ins.id left join clinical_specialty cs on b.clinical_specialty_id=cs.id left join healthcare_professional hp ON b.doctor_id=hp.id inner join person p on hp.person_id=p.id inner join identification_type itp ON p.identification_type_id=itp.id left join patient pa on b.patient_id=pa.id inner join person pp on pa.person_id=pp.id inner join identification_type itpp ON pp.identification_type_id=itpp.id inner join gender g on pp.gender_id=g.id left join person_extended pex on pex.person_id=pp.id left join address ap on pex.address_id=ap.id left join city c on ap.city_id=c.id left join patient_medical_coverage pmc ON pmc.patient_id=b.patient_medical_coverage_id left join medical_coverage mc on pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id left join health_insurance hi on hi.id=mc.id

proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id where (r.id IN ('182947002','237628005','156036003','386322007','169573007','350071000221105','235888006','78558002','429070000','609563008','609564002','44963006','309737007','370383002','171054004','313107007','171055003','440536005','87527008','237240001', '11082009','47200007','134781000119106','237239003','34801009','65147003','459166009','58532003','237233002','169565003','14418008','90968009','237244005','237627000','691000221104','135881001','312891008','274116002','82771000119102','72271000119100', OR s_hc.sctid IN ('182947002','237628005','27342004','386322007','169587007','169578003','350071000221105','235888006','127367000','609563008','609564002','44963006','309737007','370383002','171054004','313107007','171055003','440536005','169561007','87527008', '135881001','312891008','313178001','18656007','274116002','288250001','82771000119102','72271000119100','428165003','44795003','307534009','171000119107','200144004','146799005','127364007','151901000119101','250423000','56026007','127365008','199154009', '702737001','74961000119106','10761671000119108','386639001','349971000221103','10750111000119108','428252001','110081000119109','422808006') OR s_proc.sctid IN ('182947002','237628005','386322007','350071000221105','235888006','609563008','609564002','44963006','309737007','370383002','171054004','313107007','171055003','440536005','87527008','237240001','47200007','134781000119106','237239003','34801009', '65147003','459166009','58532003','237233002','90968009','237627000','691000221104','135881001','169712008','169713003','169714009','169715005','169716006','169717002','169718007','169719004','169720005','169721009','169722002','169723007', '169724001','169725000','169726004','169727008','312891008','274116002','82771000119102','72271000119100','428165003','44795003','307534009','171000119107','151901000119101','250423000','199154009','702737001','10761671000119108','386639001','349971000221103','10750111000119108', '428252001','110081000119109')) AND oc.created_on BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND oc.institution_id= :institutionId ORDER BY oc.id ASC, oc.created_on ASC ) SELECT pp.identification_number as patientIdentificationNumber, concat(pp.last_name, ' ', pp.other_last_names) as patientLastName, concat(pp.first_name, ' ', pp.middle_names) as patientFirstName, pp.birth_date as patientBirthDate, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pp.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as patientAgeToday, concat(ap.street, ' N° ', ap.number, case when ap.floor is not null then concat(' Piso: ', ap.floor, 'Departamento: ', ap.apartment) end) as patientAddress, pex.phone_number as phoneNumber, c.description as patientLocation, (select count(occ.patient_id) from outpatient_consultation occ where (occ.patient_id=b.patient_id and (occ.start_date >= date_trunc('month', (b.created_on + (INTERVAL '-10 month'))) AND occ.start_date <= (select max(bb.start_date) from base bb)))) as numberConsultations, (select string_agg(concat('Consulta con fecha: ', occ.start_date, ' (Motivos: ', (select string_agg(rc.description, ', ') from outpatient_consultation_reasons ocrc inner join reasons rc on ocrc.reason_id=rc.id where ocrc.outpatient_consultation_id=occ.id order by occ.start_date desc), ')'), ', ') from outpatient_consultation occ where (occ.patient_id=b.patient_id and (occ.start_date >= date_trunc('month', (b.created_on + (INTERVAL '-10 month'))) AND occ.start_date <= (select max(bb.start_date) from base bb)))) as consultations FROM base b left join institution ins on b.institution_id=ins.id left join clinical_specialty cs on b.clinical_specialty_id=cs.id left join healthcare_professional hp ON b.doctor_id=hp.id inner join person p on hp.person_id=p.id inner join identification_type itp ON p.identification_type_id=itp.id left join patient pa on b.patient_id=pa.id inner join person pp on pa.person_id=pp.id inner join identification_type itpp ON pp.identification_type_id=itpp.id inner join gender g on pp.gender_id=g.id left join person_extended pex on pex.person_id=pp.id left join address ap on pex.address_id=ap.id left join city c on ap.city_id=c.id left join patient_medical_coverage pmc ON pmc.id=b.patient_medical_coverage_id left join medical_coverage mc on pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id left join health_insurance hi on hi.id=mc.id

named-native-query.name: EpidemiologyReports.DenguePatientControlConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query:
WITH documents_filtered AS ( SELECT d.id, d.source_id, d.source_type_id, st.description as origin, d.created_on, d.created_by, d.updated_on, d.updated_by, d.deleted, (row_number() over(partition by d.patient_id order by d.patient_id)) AS nro_rep, d.deleted_on, d.deleted_by, d.patient_id, d.institution_id, d.clinical_specialty_id, d.other_note_id, ev.description as evolution FROM document d INNER JOIN source_type st ON d.source_type_id=st.id LEFT JOIN note ev on d.other_note_id=ev.id WHERE (d.created_on >= (CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '3 hours') AND d.created_on < (CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day' + INTERVAL '3 hours')) AND d.institution_id= :institutionId ORDER BY d.id ), base AS ( SELECT r.id as code, r.description as term, d.* FROM reasons r INNER JOIN outpatient_consultation_reasons ocr ON ocr.reason_id=r.id INNER JOIN outpatient_consultation oc ON oc.id=ocr.outpatient_consultation_id INNER JOIN documents_filtered d ON d.id=oc.document_id LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT r.id as code, r.description as term, d.* FROM reasons r INNER JOIN emergency_care_episode_reason ecer ON ecer.reason_id=r.id INNER JOIN emergency_care_episode ece ON ece.id=ecer.emergency_care_episode_id INNER JOIN documents_filtered d ON ece.id=d.source_id AND d.source_type_id=4 LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT s.sctid as code, s.pt as term, d.* FROM documents_filtered d INNER JOIN document_procedure dp ON d.id=dp.document_id INNER JOIN procedures pr ON pr.id=dp.procedure_id INNER JOIN snomed s ON s.id=pr.snomed_id LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT s.sctid as code, s.pt as term, d.* FROM documents_filtered d INNER JOIN document_health_condition dhc ON d.id=dhc.document_id INNER JOIN health_condition hc ON hc.id=dhc.health_condition_id INNER JOIN snomed s ON s.id=hc.snomed_id LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT concat('') as code, concat('') as term, d.* FROM documents_filtered d WHERE d.evolution is not null ), base_filtered AS ( SELECT b.id, b.source_id, b.origin, b.created_on, b.created_by, b.updated_on, b.updated_by, b.deleted, b.deleted_on, b.deleted_by, b.patient_id, nro_rep, b.institution_id, b.clinical_specialty_id, b.other_note_id, b.evolution FROM base b WHERE (b.code IN ('866057003', '722863008', '722862003', '409679007', '409678004', '409677009', '409676000', '409671005', '38362002', '20927009', '418429061000132101', '698613000', '122176006', '122326000', '827179001', '409694006', '315113001', '121993008', '409693000', '399302007', '1163101003', '409695007', '409693000', '409692005', '409691003', '409689006', '398560008', '315112006', '121992003', '121990006', '121989002', '121988005', '118026001', '1163097007', '122255006', '111865007', '409679007', '409678004', '409677009', '409676000', '20927009', '425732004') OR lower(b.evolution) LIKE '%dengue%') )
SELECT CASE WHEN b.evolution LIKE '%dengue%' THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS isFalsePositive, it.description as patientIdentificationType, pe.identification_number as patientIdentificationNumber, concat(pe.last_name, ' ', pe.other_last_names) as patientLastName, concat(pe.first_name, ' ', pe.middle_names) as patientFirstName, g.description as patientSex, pe.birth_date as patientBirthDate, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as patientAge, concat(a.street, ' N° ', a.number, case when a.floor is not null then concat(' Piso: ', a.floor, 'Departamento: ', a.apartment) end) as patientAddress, concat(pex.phone_prefix, ' ', pex.phone_number) as patientPhoneNumber, ci.description as patientLocation FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN patient pa ON b.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN person pe ON pa.person_id=pe.id INNER JOIN identification_type it ON pe.identification_type_id=it.id INNER JOIN gender g ON pe.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN person_extended pex ON pex.person_id=pe.id LEFT JOIN address a ON pex.address_id=a.id LEFT JOIN city ci ON a.city_id=ci.id WHERE b.nro_rep=1

named-native-query.name: EpidemiologyReports.CompleteDengueConsultationDetail
named-native-query.query:
WITH documents_filtered AS ( SELECT d.id, d.source_id, d.source_type_id, st.description as origin, d.created_on, d.created_by, d.updated_on, d.updated_by, d.deleted, (row_number() over(partition by d.patient_id order by d.patient_id)) AS nro_rep, CAST(concat(EXTRACT('HOUR' FROM d.created_on AT TIME ZONE 'UTC-3'), ':', EXTRACT('MINUTE' FROM d.created_on)) AS TIME) as hora, d.deleted_on, d.deleted_by, d.patient_id, d.institution_id, d.clinical_specialty_id, d.other_note_id, ev.description as evolution FROM document d INNER JOIN source_type st ON d.source_type_id=st.id LEFT JOIN note ev on d.other_note_id=ev.id WHERE (d.created_on >= (CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '3 hours') AND d.created_on < (CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day' + INTERVAL '3 hours')) AND d.institution_id= :institutionId ORDER BY d.created_on ), base AS ( SELECT r.id as code, r.description as term, d.* FROM reasons r INNER JOIN outpatient_consultation_reasons ocr ON ocr.reason_id=r.id INNER JOIN outpatient_consultation oc ON oc.id=ocr.outpatient_consultation_id INNER JOIN documents_filtered d ON d.id=oc.document_id LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT r.id as code, r.description as term, d.* FROM reasons r INNER JOIN emergency_care_episode_reason ecer ON ecer.reason_id=r.id INNER JOIN emergency_care_episode ece ON ece.id=ecer.emergency_care_episode_id INNER JOIN documents_filtered d ON ece.id=d.source_id AND d.source_type_id=4 LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT s.sctid as code, s.pt as term, d.* FROM documents_filtered d INNER JOIN document_procedure dp ON d.id=dp.document_id INNER JOIN procedures pr ON pr.id=dp.procedure_id INNER JOIN snomed s ON s.id=pr.snomed_id LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT s.sctid as code, s.pt as term, d.* FROM documents_filtered d INNER JOIN document_health_condition dhc ON d.id=dhc.document_id INNER JOIN health_condition hc ON hc.id=dhc.health_condition_id INNER JOIN snomed s ON s.id=hc.snomed_id LEFT JOIN note n ON d.other_note_id=n.id UNION ALL SELECT concat('') as code, concat('') as term, d.* FROM documents_filtered d WHERE d.evolution is not null ), base_filtered AS ( SELECT b.id, b.source_id, b.source_type_id, b.origin, b.created_on, b.created_by, b.updated_on, b.updated_by, b.deleted, b.deleted_on, b.deleted_by, b.patient_id, nro_rep, hora, b.institution_id, b.clinical_specialty_id, b.other_note_id, b.evolution FROM base b WHERE (b.code IN ('866057003', '722863008', '722862003', '409679007', '409678004', '409677009', '409676000', '409671005', '38362002', '20927009', '418429061000132101', '698613000', '122176006', '122326000', '827179001', '409694006', '315113001', '121993008', '409693000', '399302007', '1163101003', '409695007', '409693000', '409692005', '409691003', '409689006', '398560008', '315112006', '121992003', '121990006', '121989002', '121988005', '118026001', '1163097007', '122255006', '111865007', '409679007', '409678004', '409677009', '409676000', '20927009', '425732004') OR lower(b.evolution) LIKE '%dengue%') ), base_join AS ( SELECT b.*, ie.patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN internment_episode ie ON ie.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=0 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, oc.patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN outpatient_consultation oc ON oc.document_id=b.id UNION ALL SELECT b.*, mr.medical_coverage_id as patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN medication_request mr ON mr.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=2 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, sr.medical_coverage_id as patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN service_request sr ON sr.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=3 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, ece.patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN emergency_care_episode ece ON ece.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=4 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, vc.patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN vaccine_consultation vc ON vc.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=5 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, oc.patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN odontology_consultation oc ON oc.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=6 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, nc.patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b INNER JOIN nursing_consultation nc ON nc.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=7 UNION ALL SELECT b.*, null AS patient_medical_coverage_id FROM base_filtered b WHERE b.source_type_id IN (8, 9) ), base_reduced AS ( SELECT DISTINCT id, source_type_id, origin, source_id, hora, created_on, created_by, patient_id, patient_medical_coverage_id, institution_id, clinical_specialty_id, evolution FROM base_join )
SELECT CASE WHEN b.evolution LIKE '%dengue%' THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS isFalsePositive, b.origin as origin, cs.name as operativeUnit, it.description as patientIdentificationType, pe.identification_number as patientIdentificationNumber, concat(pe.last_name, ' ', pe.other_last_names) as patientLastName, concat(pe.first_name, ' ', pe.middle_names) as patientFirstName, g.description as patientSex, pe.birth_date as patientBirthDate, case when (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)) < 0 then concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)) -1, ' Años, ', 12 +(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') else concat((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Años, ', (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.created_on) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pe.birth_date)), ' Meses') end as patientAge, b.hora AS attentionHour, concat(mc.name, '(RNOS: ', hi.rnos, ')') as medicalCoverage, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=1) as systolicPressure, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=2) as diastolicPressure, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=3) as meanArterialPressure, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=4) as temperature, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=5) as heartRate, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=6) as respiratoryRate, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=7) as bloodOxygenSaturation, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=8) as height, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=9) as weight, (select ovs.value FROM document_vital_sign dvs INNER JOIN observation_vital_sign ovs on dvs.observation_vital_sign_id=ovs.id inner join snomed s_vs on ovs.snomed_id=s_vs.id where dvs.document_id=b.id and s_vs.id=10) as bmi, CASE WHEN b.source_type_id=1 THEN (select string_agg(r.description, ', ') from outpatient_consultation oc INNER JOIN outpatient_consultation_reasons ocr ON oc.id=ocr.outpatient_consultation_id inner join reasons r on ocr.reason_id=r.id where oc.document_id=b.id) WHEN b.source_type_id=4 THEN (select string_agg(r.description, ', ') from emergency_care_episode ece INNER JOIN emergency_care_episode_reason ecer ON ecer.emergency_care_episode_id=ece.id inner join reasons r on ecer.reason_id=r.id where ece.id=b.source_id AND b.source_type_id=4) END AS reason, (select string_agg(concat(s_prob.pt,' (',ccs.description,' & ',cvs.description,' - Fecha: ',hc.start_date, ' - Tipo: ', pt.description,')', '[SNOMED: ', s_prob.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', hc.cie10_codes, ']'), ', ') from document_health_condition dhc inner join health_condition hc on dhc.health_condition_id=hc.id inner join problem_type pt on hc.problem_id=pt.id inner join snomed s_prob on hc.snomed_id=s_prob.id inner join condition_clinical_status ccs on hc.status_id=ccs.id inner join condition_verification_status cvs on hc.verification_status_id=cvs.id where dhc.document_id=b.id and hc.problem_id<>'57177007') as problems, (select string_agg(concat(s_proc.pt, '(', ps.description, ' | SNOMED: ', s_proc.sctid, ' | CIE10: ', proc.cie10_codes, ')'), ', ') from document_procedure dp inner join procedures proc on dp.procedure_id=proc.id inner join procedures_status ps on proc.status_id=ps.id inner join snomed s_proc on proc.snomed_id=s_proc.id where dp.document_id=b.id) as procedures, b.evolution as evolution FROM base_reduced b LEFT JOIN clinical_specialty cs ON cs.id=b.clinical_specialty_id INNER JOIN patient pa ON b.patient_id=pa.id INNER JOIN person pe ON pa.person_id=pe.id INNER JOIN identification_type it ON pe.identification_type_id=it.id INNER JOIN gender g ON pe.gender_id=g.id LEFT JOIN patient_medical_coverage pmc ON pmc.id=b.patient_medical_coverage_id LEFT JOIN medical_coverage mc on pmc.medical_coverage_id=mc.id LEFT JOIN health_insurance hi on hi.id=mc.id ORDER BY b.hora

named-native-query.name: Appointment.medicalCoverage
named-native-query.query: select ap.patient_medical_coverage_id from appointment ap join appointment_assn apassn on (ap.id = apassn.appointment_id) join diary d on (apassn.diary_id = d.id) left join diary_associated_professional dap on (dap.diary_id = d.id) where ap.patient_id = :patientId and ap.date_type_id = :currentDate and ap.patient_medical_coverage_id is not null and (ap.appointment_state_id = :confirmedAppointmentState or ap.appointment_state_id = :assignedAppointmentState ) and (d.healthcare_professional_id = :professionalId or dap.healthcare_professional_id = :professionalId) order by hour asc limit 1
